name: Deer Survivors
description:
Explore the world and put together a team of deer to solve challenges you come across. You can change what each deer will do each day by clicking on their picture before setting out. Right now there are 2 areas, each with a medallion to find. Good luck!

This game is difficult to playtest on my own since I know how everything works, so any feedback is very appreciated :). This is the main reason I put this out so early, so I could maybe get some feedback while I work on the next areas.

You can follow me on Twitter @gharrot if you want to know when I update. I'll try to be vague there to not spoil anything. 

Also, I set this page to have a "discussion board" instead of comments. This because forums are cool and I miss them. Feel free to leave dumb comments down there, don't worry about actually discussing anything (unless you want to).
